title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1428/78 of 27 June 1978 amending Regulation (EEC) No 837/68 on detailed rules for the application of levies on sugar
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1428/78  of 27 June 1978  amending Regulation (EEC) No 837/68 on detailed rules for the application of levies on sugar
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Regulation (EEC) No 837/68 is hereby amended as follows:    1. In Article 1 (2), "0 710" shall read "0 720".
2. In Article 7 (4) and (5), "0 740" shall read "0 760".

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1978.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 June 1978.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 359, 31.12.1974, p. 1. (2)OJ No L 170, 27.6.1978, p. 1. (3)OJ No L 151, 30.6.1968, p. 42. (4)OJ No L 165, 28.7.1970, p. 8.
